description: A node-link diagram with force-directed layout.

signals.description: State variable for active node fix status.
signals.name: fix

signals.description: Graph node most recently interacted with.
signals.name: node

signals.description: Flag to restart Force simulation upon data changes.
signals.name: restart

signals.description: Flag to highlight node and links
signals.name: focus

on.values: fix === true ? {fx: node.x, fy: node.y} : {fx: fix[0], fy: fix[1]}
